profile:
Gutters & Eavestroughs, Eavestrough Repair, Window & Gutter Cleaning

Tip Top Trough has been specializing in aluminum and copper for almost 20 years. Pierce, the owner, has found great success in treating clients’ homes as if it were his own. We will add that little extra bit of care to your project. No matter the size. At Tip Top Trough, we pride ourselves on our industry-leading customer service, as well as our experience in providing custom solutions for all of our clients’ eavestrough and aluminum needs. Tip Top Trough’s cleaning services are thorough; the repair jobs are quick and efficient; and the installations are of the highest quality. Tip Top Trough is fully insured with WSIB and General Liability, as well as is a Licensed Contractor for the City of Toronto.

Tip Top Trough Services

> Eavestrough: clean, repair & installation > Eavestrough resecuring, resloping > Downpipe: disconnection, extension, installation, resecuring, reassembling, rain barrel installation > Heating wire: supply & installation > Leaf guard supply & installation > Splash guard supply & installation > Drip cap supply & installation > Fascia: repair, supply & installation > Soffit: repair, supply & installation > Siding: repair, supply & installation > Leak seals > Ice Damn removal > Rain barrel Installations > Flashing - Chimneys, Windows and doors > Skylight repairs Call us today for a free quote 416-781-7406 or visit us online Tip Top Trough and fill out our quick form!

profile:
Twin Peaks Roofing and Aluminum Inc. opened for business in 2006 with decades  of combined experience  in the roofing industry. Our company’s mandate since our inception has remained the same: provide our customers with quality roofing products and service at reasonable rates. We understand that if you are happy with our service, you will refer us to your friends and family; it is our pledge to our customers to work hard for your business.

For your safety and that of our employees, we are insured and have WSIB clearance. All our company vehicles are clearly marked and our team of roofing specialists are highly trained in the latest roofing safety equipment and techniques for your peace of mind.

Honest ~ Reputable ~ Affordable

Residential ~ Commercial

profile:
The Eavestrough Company has been in business for 16 years and we have more than 60 years of combined experience in the field. This has earned us a superior reputation for quality and professionalism.

We are members of the Better Business Bureau and we have won Best Eavestrough and Siding Company in the Burlington/Oakville area in 2013, 2014, 2018, 2019, 2020, 2021, and 2022. These awards were based on our phenomenal reviews about our outstanding workmanship and client experiences by homeowners who hired us to work on their homes.

The Eavestrough Company serves Burlington, Oakville, Mississauga, Niagara, Cambridge, and Hamilton area installing eavestrough, fascia, soffit, siding and leaf guard systems. Our experience and expertise has earned us one of the best reputations in the Golden Horseshoe area. If you want a job that is done to perfection and at a fair price, give The Eavestrough Company a call today at (905) 966-2564 or visit our website at www.theeavestroughcompany.com

profile:
For over 15 years Smart Roofing Inc. has provided full service roofing for residential, commercial and industrial customers throughout the Greater Toronto Area. Our skilled, experienced craftsmen, aided by the reliable products, can accurately assess your roofing situation and expedite any job quickly and to your full satisfaction. 

We are dedicated to providing quality, professional installation and service commitment with fair prices. For your protection we are fully insured, bonded and licensed, and are proud members of the Better Business Bureau. We offer from 6 to 15-year written guarantee on our workmanship and only experienced crews of roofers are used. Smart Roofing has maintained these standards over the years and will continue to do such as our family of satisfied customers grows and shares their experience with peers, family and friends. 

Please contact us today for a free estimate or visit our showroom. At Smart Roofing Inc. "We protect what you value most". Make the SMART choice.
_____________________________________________

profile:
Landmark Home Solutions have been supplying comfort and peace of mind to homeowners across Ontario since 1987. We’re proud to offer one of the most energy efficient windows available on the market today that offers homeowners a significant return on investment all while being backed with the strongest warranty in the business today!
 
We’re part of the Canadian Standards Association (CSA) and the Better Business Bureau, and in all the years we’ve been in business, we’ve never had an unresolved complaint. We’re members of SAWDAC (Siding and Window Dealers Association of Canada) and make sure that we meet their membership criteria, code of ethics and sign an ironclad five-year workmanship guarantee statement.
 
We’re also proud to say that our windows are Energy Star certified.  As you probably know, the international Energy Star symbol is a simple way for consumers to identify products that are among the most energy-efficient on the market. We also offer financing through TD Canada Trust, ensuring that our customers have a trustworthy partner too.
Based in St. Catharines, Ontario, 

Landmark Home Solutions is proud to represent our Canadian heritage in all that we do.  Our windows are made right here, so you know you’re getting the best quality windows in the world.
